content:
# It appears that I cannot craft any items at this moment, as the only items in my inventory are Iron Plates, Iron Ore, and Stone. 
# This indicates that I need additional resources or items to craft Iron Gear Wheels or any other components.

# To proceed, I should consider gathering more resources or crafting other items that may help expand my capabilities.
# Since I have enough Iron Ore, I can smelt more Iron Plates to increase my inventory. 

# I will repeat the process of smelting more Iron Ore into Iron Plates using the Stone Furnace. 
# First, I will insert the Iron Ore back into the furnace.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, Position(x=0, y=0), quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 Iron Ore into the furnace again.
print(f"Inventory after inserting Iron Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after inserting Iron Ore. 

# I will also ensure the furnace has enough fuel by checking the Coal inventory.
coal_quantity = inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.Coal, 0)  # Check for Coal availability.
if coal_quantity < 5:
    print("Not enough Coal available to fuel the furnace! I need to gather some more.")
    # If not enough coal, I will need to gather more from the nearest coal resource.
    nearest_coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Look for the nearest coal resource again.
    print(f"Nearest coal position: {nearest_coal_position}") 
else:
    # If there is enough coal, I will insert it into the furnace.
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, Position(x=0, y=0), quantity=5)  # Fuel the furnace with 5 coal.
